metadata.Title: CVE-2020-10691 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An archive traversal flaw was found in all ansible-engine versions 2.9.x prior to 2.9.7, when running ansible-galaxy collection install. When extracting a collection .tar.gz file, the directory is created without sanitizing the filename. An attacker could take advantage to overwrite any file within the system.

criterions.comment: ansible package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
